description: A WaterBody represents significant and permanent or semi-permanent accumulations of surface water, usually covering a part of the Earth.

properties.name: class
properties.description: Indicates the specific type of the WaterBody.

properties.name: function
properties.description: Specifies the intended purposes of the WaterBody.

properties.name: usage
properties.description: Specifies the actual uses of the WaterBody.

properties.name: lod1MultiCurve
properties.description: Relates to a 3D MultiCurve geometry that represents the WaterBody in Level of Detail 1. Deprecated since CityGML 3.0.

properties.name: lod1MultiSurface
properties.description: Relates to a 3D MultiSurface geometry that represents the WaterBody in Level of Detail 1. Deprecated since CityGML 3.0.

properties.name: lod4Solid
properties.description: Relates to a 3D Solid geometry that represents the WaterBody in Level of Detail 4. Deprecated since CityGML 3.0.
